H0.text: What name is given to the hot, molten rock found under the surface of the earth. Lava

H1.text: What name is given to the hot, molten rock found under the surface of the earth. Geoma

H2.text: What name is given to the hot, molten rock found under the surface of the earth. Pyrope

H3.text: What name is given to the hot, molten rock found under the surface of the earth. MAGMA

A4.text: Magma (sometimes colloquially but incorrectly referred to as lava) is found beneath the surface of the Earth.

A5.text: Magma (from Ancient Greek  μάγμα (mágma) 'thick unguent') is the molten or semi-molten natural material from which all igneous rocks are formed.
